title: An Ode to Oral (Sex)
itunes:title: An Ode to Oral (Sex)

description:
On today’s show, Emily’s helping you communicate your way to better sex and relationships – with a partner, or with yourself.

She talks about the oral sex double standard, ways to overcome your sexual insecurities, and what to do when you’ve given up on having an orgasm. Plus, she gives a first hand account about the hidden and sometimes surprising benefits of masturbation.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Promescent, We-Vibe, Womanizer


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
